"I've seen others learn the guitar much faster and with less effort. How can I do the same?"
"I've seen others play the guitar with more skill and precision. How can I improve my own playing?"
"I've seen others write their own songs on the guitar. How can I do the same?"
"I've seen others perform on stage with the guitar. How can I prepare for my own performance?"
"I've seen others use the guitar to create different sounds and styles of music. How can I experiment with the guitar and create my own unique sound?"
